00001 /*===========================================================================
00002 =                                                                           =
00003 =                               MtkPixelTime                                =
00004 =                                                                           =
00005 =============================================================================

00007                          Jet Propulsion Laboratory
00008                                    MISR

00010 
00011             Copyright 2006, California Institute of Technology.
00012                            ALL RIGHTS RESERVED.
00013                  U.S. Government Sponsorship acknowledged.
00014 
00015 ============================================================================*/
00016 
00017 #include "MisrCoordQuery.h"
00018 #include "MisrFileQuery.h"
00019 #include "MisrUtil.h"
00020 #include "MisrError.h"
00021 
00022 #define TIME_BETWEEN_LINE 0.0408 /* Seconds */
00023 
00041 MTKt_status MtkPixelTime(
00042   MTKt_TimeMetaData time_metadata, 
00043   double som_x, 
00044   double som_y, 
00045   char pixel_time[MTKd_DATETIME_LEN]  )
00046 {
00047   MTKt_status status;      /* Return status */
00048   MTKt_status status_code; /* Return code of this function */
00049   int block;
00050   float line_275;
00051   float sample_275;
00052   int trfm = -1;
00053   int transform;
00054   double delta_line;
00055   double delta_samp;
00056   double C1, C2, C3, C4, C5, C6;
00057   double delta_imgl;
00058   double offset;
00059   double tai_ref_time;
00060   
00061   if (pixel_time == NULL)
00062     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_NULLPTR);
00063   
00064   status = MtkSomXYToBls(time_metadata.path,MAXRESOLUTION,som_x,som_y,&block,&line_275,&sample_275);    
00065   MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00066 
00067   /* Make line relative to start of orbit */
00068   line_275 += (float)(512.0 * (block - 1));
00069   
00070   if (block < time_metadata.start_block || block > time_metadata.end_block ||
00071       time_metadata.number_transform[block] <= 0)
00072     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_FAILURE);
00073 
00074   /* Determine which transform to use */
00075   for (transform = 0; transform < NGRIDCELL; ++transform)
00076   {
00077     if (time_metadata.start_line[block][transform] == 0 &&
00078         time_metadata.number_line[block][transform] == 0)   
00079       continue;
00080   
00081     if (line_275 > time_metadata.start_line[block][transform] &&
00082         line_275 < time_metadata.start_line[block][transform] +
00083                    time_metadata.number_line[block][transform])
00084     {
00085         trfm = transform;
00086         break;
00087     }
00088   }
00089 
00090   if (trfm < 0 || trfm > 1)
00091     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_FAILURE);
00092 
00093   delta_line = line_275 - time_metadata.som_ctr_x[block][trfm];
00094   delta_samp = sample_275 - time_metadata.som_ctr_y[block][trfm];
00095 
00096   C1 = time_metadata.coeff_line[block][0][trfm];
00097   C2 = time_metadata.coeff_line[block][1][trfm];
00098   C3 = time_metadata.coeff_line[block][2][trfm];
00099   C4 = time_metadata.coeff_line[block][3][trfm];
00100   C5 = time_metadata.coeff_line[block][4][trfm];
00101   C6 = time_metadata.coeff_line[block][5][trfm];
00102 
00103   delta_imgl = C1 + C2 * delta_line + C3 * delta_samp + C4 * delta_samp * delta_samp +
00104                C5 * delta_line * delta_samp + C6 * delta_samp * delta_samp * delta_samp;
00105 
00106   offset = delta_imgl * TIME_BETWEEN_LINE;
00107   
00108   status = MtkUtcToTai(time_metadata.ref_time[block][trfm], &tai_ref_time);
00109   MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00110   
00111   status = MtkTaiToUtc(tai_ref_time + offset, pixel_time);
00112   MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00113     
00114   return MTK_SUCCESS;
00115  
00116 ERROR_HANDLE:
00117   return status_code;
00118 }
